config.cs.enabled.desc: Enable or disable the custom scoreboard
config.cs.appearance.desc: Edit this list to change the order of appearance of the scoreboard.
config.cs.title_options.desc: Edit the title of the scoreboard.
config.cs.footer_options.desc: Edit the footer of the scoreboard.
config.cs.number_format.desc: Choose the format of the numbers in the scoreboard.
config.cs.title_footer.alignment.desc: Choose the alignment of this element.
config.cs.title_footer.use_custom_text.d: Enable or disable custom text for this element.
config.cs.title_footer.custom_text.desc: Edit the custom text for this element.
